name: Alexis Scott
text: Service was amazing (Angie is the best). Food was so good. We ordered a speciality pizza and it came out wrong and the waitress was able to quickly get us a new one, took it off our bill and gave us a free pizza! All while she was chatting with us and making it a great experience. We will be back!!!

name: Carl Schonhardt
text: The food and service was excellent.  This site was the best Pizza Hut I've been to for quite some time.  Waitress was great. Salad bar was fresh and well stocked.

name: John Barton
text: Place was reasonably priced until they changed their menu. They cut out a lot of their specials and is now WAY over priced. I won't be coming back to Pizza hut.

name: Tony Perry
text: The pizza is ok (three stars) but inconsistent.  The facility needs to be bulldozed and rebuilt.  The inside is in poor shape.  It needs thoroughly cleaned.  The outside of the building is about the same.  The staff is friendly.  The parking lot can be tricky to enter/exit.

name: John Burket
text: Food is good,  but why is a large cheese pizza in house $13, and a large 2 topping for carryout only 8 bucks?   Management seriously needs to consider this.   No wonder the store is practicality empty any time we go there.   Our daughters ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Wilkinson
text: Great staff, slow dine in business while I was there but that just means mire personal service. P'zone was delicious and made just right.

name: Krista Thompson
text: Good staff and good pizza for the price

name: George Villegas
text: The pizza is always good (and at a fair price), but what I love most is the heart of their team - after the recent flood here in Zelienople and Harmony, they drove around giving pizzas to those working & helping those that were flooded. I am now a customer for life! ‚ù§

name: Jeff Manes
text: I swing by pretty often for a pizza and the people here are honestly so nice, I've never had an issue with the quality or the customer service and everybody is super friendly.

name: Roger Black
text: Privately owned pizza hut.  Only one waitress on a Saturday night.  Didn't have several of the menu items, didn't have chicken for salads, didn't have unsweetened iced tea, didn't have sauce for bread sticks, tables left uncleaned, etc.  Very poor management, it seems.  The food that we were able to get was good, however.

name: Audrey Watson
text: The two orders of wings were cold, (not whole wings 3 wings and five very small pieces) which included hard  chicken without breading, there wasn't enough sauce to coat the chicken and was not freshly made.  It wasn't eatable.  Gal at counter very nice.

name: N Joseph Vaccarello
text: Classic Hut experience.  It's still good after all these years.  Had the burning hot wings not bad.  Very large wings ate like a meal v appetizer.  Burning hot was hot but not too hot to eat.

name: Patrick Erkman
text: Waitress was awesome. Pizza was great!!!

name: Lisa Baker
text: Harmony Pizza Hut has great people working for them! A younger person, who only had worked there for 2 weeks, gave me EXCEPTIONAL service! I believe his name was Kurtis! Do much do that I went online and completed a survey so that I could ‚Ä¶More

name: Elaine Mings
text: The salad bar had nice, fresh ingredients for my healthy side. The pizza buffet had variety, as well as tasty garlic bread, dessert pizza, and cinnamon bread. There would have been 5 stars if the floor around the buffet hadn't been so sticky. It's difficult to control customers messes sometimes,  but it really was unpleasant.

name: Michelle P
text: I placed an online order for future pick up,  the order was placed before 4 pm, and the pick up time set at 6:00 pm.  When I arrived, I was informed my pizza was still in the oven, which was no big deal, 10 minutes later an employee asked ‚Ä¶More

name: Ron Reyer
text: Always great crust.  Recently sparse with toppings; specifically pepperoni and mushrooms.

name: Dan Miller
text: Good food great service

name: Nathan James
text: Order take out and delivery here pretty regularly and it is normally pretty fast and good. Dont order the wings though they are gross.

name: J
text: This place was terrible and someone should burn it down. The greasy nasty staff were horrible.  The food is just okay at best.

name: ryan mallen
text: Always amazing service. Local lunch buffet you can't beat. Dessert pizzas and everything. Great local dine in pizza place doesn't feel like a chain.

name: Graham Ferry
text: Same as any Pizza Hut.  Super friendly staff though.

name: Angie Beighley
text: Its changed since the last time I was there, nice waitress but holes in her shirt, never asked about refills till we were almost done eating, buffet was cold. It was supposed to be wing night and got charged full price.

name: Jes Scott
text: Nice staff great food

name: Sharon Monteleone
text: We were the only customers, close to closing and we were treated very well. We'll be back again!

name: Ken Kotula
text: Daily lunch buffet always hits the spot. Waitresses are always in a great mood and smiling. Never too crowded during lunch and the pizzas keep coming.

name: Necole Ross
text: Their pizza is not as good as it use to be. They have change something with the recipe and it doesn't taste as good as it use to

name: Matthew Lazan
text: Food was ok, but pricey for what you get.  The restaurant needs some serious TLC, and cleaning.

name: Russell Carpenter
text: Decent pizza but not really worth the high prices

name: Michael Schwartz
text: Amazing service, decent breadsticks, pizza was as expected.  I wish there were more sit down pizza places in the area.  Pizza Hut is a dying breed.

name: Sandra Fields
text: Awesome service.  Food was good

name: Thomas Hartman
text: Bad service, bad food, place needs a remodel bad.

name: AxxiosGrey
text: This is a go to hang out spot.  I love the staff here, I love the food here.  They have never disappointed me.

name: ronald smith
text: The workers are super kind the food is fresh would go again with friends

name: Delsa White
text: Good that there is A salad bar.  Not fav pizza.  Very nice service.

name: Echo Bubb
text: Good food and service.

name: Victoria Phillips
text: Most of the time it is really great, especially when i pick it up myself. But if i order online, and get it delivered, something is always missing. It is usually our breadstick sauces, so nothing major...but who can eat breadsticks without ‚Ä¶More

name: Pam Kelly
text: No one EVER answers the phone!!!

name: Harry Dierdorf
text:
Just
Good.  Happy service good

name: Harry Kruse
text: Constantly had to wait for pizza to be put on buffet. Long waits

name: Joseph Corraini
text: Pizza is a little greasy. beer selection not great. Friendly service

name: Nottoday EPA
text: Food was good, server and manager are amazing and so friendly!!

name: Allen Adderholt
text: Go often for lunch buffet and they always keep the buffet well stocked.

name: jagalasso
text: Food is pretty good and servers are friendly

name: Darren Mershimer
text: My brother and I came in late and they served us quickly and efficiently

name: Ricki Neff
text: Product is competitively comparable to any other Pizza Hut. Located conveniently on Rt. 19 in Zelienople (main highway). Known for quick service.

name: Promeder
text: Always had friendly service. Darla,Carrie and Angela are very nice.

name: Samantha Getz
text: We love their Sunday lunch buffet!

name: Denise Fair
text: Fast carry out service. 10 minutes from placing the order to out the door.

name: Brandon Barnhart
text: Pizza is good but the place could use a makeover.

name: Jonathan Zeigler
text: Good lunch buffet good prices. Friendly staff.

name: Rick Murray
text: Waited for a half hour at the door for a seat, it was 1:00 still waiting at a table for someone to take our order. The place is filthy, every corner has cobwebs, there are three people here that I can see to do all the work, I buss boy one waitress and one cook, at lunch hour?

name: Brian Whitmer
text: Always great food and service!

name: Alex Zowacki
text: Service was good and the food qas good

name: Jason Loscar
text: Never received any bad orders however delivery time sometimes take very long even though I'm not right down the road

name: James Bresnihan
text: Great pizza and service

name: jimmy wolfe
text: Good place to dine at service is great

name: Darren Strohecker
text: The food was delicious!

name: Matthew Rubright
text: Great lunch buffet

name: Robin Schramm
text: Love this place!!

name: Ryo Inspiritus
text: Like any other Pizza.

name: WolfAsh 999
text: Always get my food right and out on time

name: Ruth Downey
text: Its Pizza Hut. What else is there to say?

name: Fishing With Josh
text: I don't like pizza

name: Jack Hauer
text: Lunch buffet is good.

name: Judy Schall
text: Always good.

text: Hot and good pizza not a long waitüòÅ! But no beers

text: Okay

text: Could be better

text: Friendly staff.

name: JoAnn Minett

name: Hui Hui

name: Sylvia D Brooks
text: Today they put out cold pizza on the buffet.

name: Kirtus Stafford

name: Sean O'Brien
text: Lunch buffet. Made pizza to my request

name: Anne Daily

name: reni mae

text: super fast delivery

name: Byron Clingerman
text: Full salad bar and Wed pizza buffet. Friendly staff!
